name: Blue Thief
description:
You are Pierre Desperaux, a world renowned art thief. The magnificent blue diamond is being displayed on the top floor of the Perugia Museum. The diamond is worth $23,567,320.98. stealing it would be the greatest art heist in history. 

Look for clues around the museum and try to figure out the combination to unlock the door to get to the next level. But be aware of the security cameras. They will trigger the alarm. 

Controls

WASD - to move

SPACE - to interact with paintings or statues

P - to pause

Developed by:

Cem Alemdar, Peter Nolan, Kit Campolieta, Myles Karam
